li.label: morphed
li.description: I'm- QUACK! covered in feathers- QUACK!

li.label: morphed
li.description: They way these feathers feel is amazing! Now where can I find some bread...

li.label: morphed
li.description: Oh man, I look like some kind of monster. I want revenge on the QUACK that did this to me.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm back to my normal, human self again! No more feathers...

li.label: reverted
li.description: But the feathers! My beak! I would have preferred to stay that way.

li.label: reverted
li.description: Hands at last. I can go the rest of my life without eating bread.

li.label: reverted
li.description: I'm human again? I think I wanted the opposite of this.
